summary: After the Civil War, a Confederate veteran must track down five outlaws who murdered his father and ransacked his farm during the war.
cast: Rory Calhoun|Kristine Miller|Andrew Duggan|Yvette Duguay|Peter Whitney|Eugene Iglesias|Robert Burton|Roy Barcroft|Bart Braverman|Paul E. Burns|Wes Christensen|Ray Corrigan|Fred Graham|Duane Grey|James Griffith|Don C. Harvey|Al Haskell|Thomas Browne Henry|Ethan Laidlaw|Tom London|Rankin Mansfield|Dennis Moore|Rickey Murray|Don Orlando|'Snub' Pollard|Denver Pyle|Bob Reeves|Gloria Rhoads|Frank Sully|Harry Tyler
title: Domino Kid
